Please read and accept the terms below t: Please read and accept the terms below to continue
By signing or accepting this form, you c: By signing or accepting this form, you consent to the processing of your Personal Data by SentryGuardOrg ("Partner") in the context of the Partner's application titled SentryGuard (the "App").
Partner is the data controller responsib: Partner is the data controller responsible for the processing of your Personal Data in the context of the App.
By signing or accepting this form, you a: By signing or accepting this form, you also acknowledge receipt of the Tesla Customer Privacy Notice available at
(\"Tesla Privacy Notice\") and consent t: ("Tesla Privacy Notice") and consent to processing of Personal Data by Tesla in accordance with the Tesla Privacy Notice.
The App allows you to benefit from advan: The App allows you to benefit from advanced monitoring and notification features based on your Tesla vehicle's Sentry Mode, including the identification and logging of security events (e.g., event detection, Sentry Mode alerts).
Partner does not access or process other: Partner does not access or process other categories of data from your vehicle (e.g., remote commands, detailed driving data, battery or precise location information), beyond what is strictly necessary for the App to function as described above.
Partner maintains administrative, techni: Partner maintains administrative, technical, and physical safeguards designed to protect Personal Data against accidental, unlawful or unauthorized destruction, loss, alteration, access, disclosure or use, including encryption of data in transit and, where appropriate, at rest. Partner will only retain your Personal Data for as long as necessary to provide you with the App and the features described above, unless otherwise required or authorized by applicable law or if you request early deletion.
Subject to applicable law (including GDP:
Subject to applicable law (including GDPR), you may have the right to request access and receive information about your Personal Data, update and correct inaccuracies, and request deletion when legal conditions are met. You also have the right to withdraw your consent at any time, without cost, which may however limit or prevent use of the App.

To exercise your rights, withdraw your consent or obtain more information about the App and the processing of your Personal Data, you can contact Partner at: hello@sentryguard.org.
I consent to the collection, use, and pr: I consent to the collection, use, and processing of my Personal Data as described above.
By clicking \"I Accept\", you agree to t: By clicking "I Accept", you agree to the terms above and consent to the processing of your personal data.
Are you sure you want to revoke your con: Are you sure you want to revoke your consent? This will permanently delete your account and all associated data, including telemetry configurations.
Find answers to common questions about S: Find answers to common questions about SentryGuard
SentryGuard is a non-profit, open-source: SentryGuard is a non-profit, open-source service that monitors your Tesla vehicle's Sentry Mode status in real-time and sends instant alerts via Telegram when suspicious activity is detected. It uses Tesla's official API and telemetry to provide efficient monitoring without draining your battery.
Yes, SentryGuard is completely free to u: Yes, SentryGuard is completely free to use. However, it depends on donations to cover server and development costs. If donations no longer cover expenses, the service may need to adapt, but we strive to keep it free and open-source for the community.
No, SentryGuard is not affiliated with T: No, SentryGuard is not affiliated with Tesla, Inc. It is an independent, community-driven project. Tesla and the Tesla logo are trademarks of Tesla, Inc.
SentryGuard uses Tesla's official Fleet: SentryGuard uses Tesla's official Fleet API to monitor your vehicle's Sentry Mode status via telemetry. When Sentry Mode is triggered, you receive instant notifications through Telegram. The monitoring is battery-efficient as it uses telemetry data rather than constantly polling your vehicle.
How do I get started with SentryGuard?: How do I get started with SentryGuard?
To get started, click \"Login with Tesla: To get started, click "Login with Tesla" on the homepage. You'll be redirected to Tesla's official authentication page. After logging in and granting permissions, you'll need to accept the consent form, then configure Telegram alerts and enable telemetry for your vehicles.
SentryGuard requires access to your vehi: SentryGuard requires access to your vehicle's telemetry data to monitor Sentry Mode status. It does not access location data, battery details, or remote commands beyond what is necessary for monitoring Sentry Mode events.
How do I link my Telegram account?: How do I link my Telegram account?
Go to the Telegram Configuration page in: Go to the Telegram Configuration page in your dashboard, click "Generate Telegram Link", and open the link in Telegram. The bot will automatically link your account. The link expires in 15 minutes for security.
What if I can't enable telemetry for my: What if I can't enable telemetry for my vehicle?
Some vehicles may not support telemetry: Some vehicles may not support telemetry due to hardware limitations (pre-2018 Model S/X) or firmware versions. Make sure your vehicle has a virtual key paired and is running a supported firmware version. If issues persist, check the error message for specific details.
Yes, SentryGuard uses Tesla's official A: Yes, SentryGuard uses Tesla's official API with end-to-end encryption. Your data is stored securely and only used to provide monitoring and alert services. We only access the minimal data necessary for Sentry Mode monitoring.
SentryGuard only collects: profile infor: SentryGuard only collects: profile information (account identifier, display name or email), minimal vehicle information (VIN, Sentry Mode status, event metadata). We do not access location data, detailed driving data, battery information, or remote commands beyond what is necessary for Sentry Mode monitoring.
Yes, you can unlink your Telegram accoun: Yes, you can unlink your Telegram account and revoke your consent at any time. This will remove all associated data. You can also contact us at hello@sentryguard.org to request data deletion.
Your data is stored on secure servers wi: Your data is stored on secure servers with encryption in transit and at rest. We maintain administrative, technical, and physical safeguards to protect your personal data.
I'm not receiving Telegram alerts. What: I'm not receiving Telegram alerts. What should I do?
First, verify that your Telegram account: First, verify that your Telegram account is linked correctly. Send a test message from the Telegram Configuration page. Make sure telemetry is enabled for your vehicle and that Sentry Mode is active on your Tesla. Check that you haven't blocked the Telegram bot.
Why did my Tesla authorization get revok: Why did my Tesla authorization get revoked?
Tesla authorization can be revoked if yo: Tesla authorization can be revoked if you remove SentryGuard from your Tesla account, change your Tesla password, or if Tesla security policies require re-authorization. Simply log in again to restore access.
SentryGuard shows \"Virtual Key Not Pair: SentryGuard shows "Virtual Key Not Paired". What does this mean?
You need to pair a virtual key with your: You need to pair a virtual key with your vehicle to use SentryGuard. This is done through the Tesla app. Go to Security & Drivers in your Tesla app and add SentryGuard as a key. Then return to SentryGuard and refresh your vehicles.
Can I use SentryGuard with multiple vehi: Can I use SentryGuard with multiple vehicles?
Yes, SentryGuard supports multiple vehic: Yes, SentryGuard supports multiple vehicles. Each vehicle can be configured independently. Go to the Vehicles page to manage telemetry for each vehicle.
You can support SentryGuard by making a: You can support SentryGuard by making a donation through the Buy Me a Coffee widget on the website. Your support helps cover server costs and keeps the service free for everyone. You can also contribute to the project on GitHub.
How can I report a bug or request a feat: How can I report a bug or request a feature?
You can report bugs or request features: You can report bugs or request features by opening an issue on our GitHub repository at https://github.com/abarghoud/SentryGuard. We welcome community contributions!
Who can I contact for support?: Who can I contact for support?
For support, you can contact us at hello: For support, you can contact us at hello@sentryguard.org or open an issue on GitHub. We do our best to respond to all inquiries.
Can't find the answer you're looking for: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Please feel free to contact us.
Does Sentry Mode need to be activated to: Does Sentry Mode need to be activated to receive notifications?
Why isn't there a mobile app?: Why isn't there a mobile app?
Does SentryGuard impact the vehicle's ba: Does SentryGuard impact the vehicle's battery or range?
What is SentryGuard description: SentryGuard is a non-profit, open-source service that monitors your Tesla vehicle's Sentry Mode status in real-time and sends instant alerts via Telegram when suspicious activity is detected. It uses Tesla's official API and telemetry to provide efficient monitoring without draining your battery.
SentryGuard requires active Sentry Mode: Yes, Sentry Mode must be active on your Tesla vehicle for SentryGuard to detect and send alerts. The service monitors when Sentry Mode is triggered, but it cannot function if Sentry Mode is disabled in your vehicle settings.
Why we chose Telegram: Telegram was chosen because it's a fast, reliable, and secure messaging platform that works globally. It provides instant notifications without requiring users to install additional apps, and it has excellent battery efficiency. Unlike SMS or other messaging services, Telegram is free, encrypted, and works reliably across all countries.
Why no mobile app: SentryGuard is developed by a small community team with limited resources and no budget. Creating and maintaining a mobile app would require significant additional development time, app store submissions, and ongoing maintenance across iOS and Android platforms. Since Telegram already provides excellent mobile notifications, we focused our limited resources on the core functionality. The web interface is responsive and works well on mobile devices.
Is SentryGuard free description: Yes, SentryGuard is completely free to use. However, it depends on donations to cover server and development costs. If donations no longer cover expenses, the service may need to adapt, but we strive to keep it free and open-source for the community.
Is SentryGuard affiliated with Tesla des: No, SentryGuard is not affiliated with Tesla, Inc. It is an independent, community-driven project. Tesla and the Tesla logo are trademarks of Tesla, Inc.
How does SentryGuard work description: SentryGuard uses Tesla's official Fleet API to monitor your vehicle's Sentry Mode status via telemetry. When Sentry Mode is triggered, you receive instant notifications through Telegram. The monitoring is battery-efficient as it uses telemetry data rather than constantly polling your vehicle.
How to get started with SentryGuard: To get started, click "Login with Tesla" on the homepage. You'll be redirected to Tesla's official authentication page. After logging in and granting permissions, you'll need to accept the consent form. Then, in the <0>Vehicles page</0>, pair a virtual key with your vehicle (this will redirect you to Tesla's website to approve via the Tesla app), <1>configure Telegram alerts</1>, and enable telemetry for your vehicles.
What permissions SentryGuard needs: SentryGuard requires access to your vehicle's telemetry data to monitor Sentry Mode status. It does not access location data, battery details, or remote commands beyond what is necessary for monitoring Sentry Mode events.
How to link Telegram account: Go to the <0>Telegram Configuration page</0> in your dashboard, click "Generate Telegram Link", and open the link in Telegram. The bot will automatically link your account. The link expires in 15 minutes for security.
Cannot enable telemetry help: Some vehicles may not support telemetry due to hardware limitations (pre-2018 Model S/X) or firmware versions. Make sure your vehicle has a virtual key paired and is running a supported firmware version. If issues persist, check the error message for specific details.
Is my data secure answer: Yes, SentryGuard uses Tesla's official API with end-to-end encryption. Your data is stored securely and only used to provide monitoring and alert services. We only access the minimal data necessary for Sentry Mode monitoring.
What data SentryGuard collects: SentryGuard only collects: profile information (account identifier, display name or email), minimal vehicle information (VIN, Sentry Mode status, event metadata). We do not access location data, detailed driving data, battery information, or remote commands beyond what is necessary for Sentry Mode monitoring.
Can I delete my data answer: Yes, you can unlink your Telegram account and revoke your consent at any time. This will remove all associated data. Data deletion functionality is currently in development. For now, please contact us at <0>hello@sentryguard.org</0> to request data deletion.
Where is my data stored answer: Your data is stored on secure servers located in Europe, with encryption in transit and at rest. We maintain administrative, technical, and physical safeguards to protect your personal data.
Not receiving alerts help: First, verify that your Telegram account is linked correctly. Send a test message from the <0>Telegram Configuration page</0>. Make sure telemetry is enabled for your vehicle and that Sentry Mode is active on your Tesla. Also check the <1>vehicle configuration</1> to activate telemetry and set up the virtual key. Finally, check that you haven't blocked the Telegram bot.
SentryGuard battery impact: No, SentryGuard has no impact on your vehicle's battery or range. The service uses Tesla's telemetry system, which is designed to be extremely efficient. Unlike third-party apps that might poll your vehicle constantly, SentryGuard only receives data when events occur, using minimal bandwidth and no additional battery power from your vehicle.
Tesla authorization revoked help: Tesla authorization can be revoked if you remove SentryGuard from your Tesla account, change your Tesla password, or if Tesla security policies require re-authorization. Simply log in again to restore access.
Virtual key not paired help: You need to pair a virtual key with your vehicle to use SentryGuard. In the <0>Vehicles page</0>, click the "Pair Virtual Key" button which will redirect you to Tesla's website. This will open your Tesla app where you can approve the virtual key request. Once approved, return to SentryGuard and refresh your vehicles.
Multiple vehicles support: Yes, SentryGuard supports multiple vehicles. Each vehicle can be configured independently. Go to the Vehicles page to manage telemetry for each vehicle.
How to support SentryGuard: You can support SentryGuard by making a donation through the Buy Me a Coffee widget on the website, or directly at <1>https://buymeacoffee.com/sentryguardorg</1>. Your support helps cover server costs and keeps the service free for everyone. You can also contribute to the project on <0>GitHub</0> by starring the repository, reporting issues, or submitting pull requests.
How to report bugs or request features: You can report bugs or request features by opening an issue on our <0>GitHub repository</0>, or by contacting us through the support chat on the website. We welcome community contributions!
Who to contact for support: For support, you can contact us at <0>hello@sentryguard.org</0>, open an issue on <1>GitHub</1>, or use the support chat on the website. We do our best to respond to all inquiries.
SentryGuard video access explanation: SentryGuard does not have access to video footage from your vehicle's cameras. However, when you receive a Sentry Mode alert via Telegram, you can click the "Check" button in the message to open the Tesla app directly and view the live camera feed to verify what triggered the alert.
Do I need Tesla Premium Connectivity to: Do I need Tesla Premium Connectivity to use SentryGuard?
Tesla Premium Connectivity requirement: No, you do not need Tesla Premium Connectivity to use SentryGuard. The service works with Tesla's standard connectivity and uses the Fleet API for telemetry data. However, Premium Connectivity may be required for some advanced Tesla features, but SentryGuard itself operates with basic vehicle connectivity.
Why doesn't Sentry Mode trigger when I t: Why doesn't Sentry Mode trigger when I test it myself?
Sentry Mode testing explanation: When testing Sentry Mode yourself with your phone nearby, Tesla detects your digital key and doesn't trigger Sentry Mode because it recognizes an authorized user. Sentry Mode only activates when the vehicle senses potential unauthorized activity. To properly test, either use someone else's phone to trigger motion/camera detection, or test from further away without your phone present.
Why is SentryGuard faster than Tesla not: Why is SentryGuard faster than Tesla notifications?
SentryGuard speed advantage explanation: SentryGuard provides instant notifications as soon as Tesla detects an event and begins recording, giving you immediate awareness of potential security incidents. In contrast, Tesla's own app only shows recorded video after the recording is complete, and even Tesla's direct notifications arrive several seconds later. This speed advantage can be crucial for responding quickly to security threats.
Manage your account settings and prefere: Manage your account settings and preferences
Name: Name
Delete account description: Deleting your account is permanent and irreversible. All your data, including telemetry configurations, Telegram alerts, and vehicle information will be permanently deleted.
Delete account confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is permanent and will delete all your data, including telemetry configurations and Telegram alerts. This action cannot be undone.
Thank you for your interest in SentryGua: Thank you for your interest in SentryGuard
We have received your registration for: We have received your registration for
Your account is pending approval. We'll: Your account is pending approval. We'll send you an email once your account has been approved and you can start using SentryGuard.
Approval is typically processed within 2: Approval is typically processed within 24-48 hours.
Join our Discord community while you wai: Join our Discord community while you wait!
SentryGuard is currently in beta with li: SentryGuard is currently in beta with limited capacity.
Current wait time is typically several w: Current wait time is typically several weeks.
Official launch coming soon with faster: The official launch is coming in approximately 1 month, when approval times will be significantly faster.
Why is there a waitlist answer: SentryGuard is currently in beta with limited server capacity. The waitlist helps us manage growth responsibly while ensuring the service remains stable and reliable for all users. As we scale, the waitlist will become less restrictive.
How long does waitlist approval take?: How long does waitlist approval take?
How long does waitlist approval take ans: Current wait time is typically several weeks. The official launch is coming in approximately 1 month, when approval times will be significantly faster. After the launch, new users should expect faster processing.
What happens after I'm approved answer: Once approved, you'll receive a welcome email with a step-by-step guide to get started. You'll have access to your dashboard where you can configure Telegram alerts, pair a virtual key with your vehicle, and enable telemetry monitoring.
I signed up but didn't receive an approv: I signed up but didn't receive an approval email. What should I do?

First, check your spam and promotional folders. The welcome email is sent automatically once your account is approved. If you have any questions about your status, please contact us at hello@sentryguard.org with your email address.
Can I check my waitlist status?: Can I check my waitlist status?
Can I check my waitlist status answer: You can check your status by trying to log in. If you're redirected to the waitlist page, your account is still pending approval. Once approved, you'll be able to log in normally to your dashboard.
Can I use SentryGuard while on the waitl: Can I use SentryGuard while on the waitlist?

No, you'll need to wait for approval to access the dashboard and use SentryGuard's features. While waiting, we recommend exploring our FAQ and documentation to prepare for when your account is approved.
What if I try to log in before being app: What if I try to log in before being approved?
You'll be redirected to the waitlist page where you can see your email address. You'll remain on the waitlist until we approve your account, at which point you can log in normally.
When is the official launch answer: The official launch is coming in approximately 1 month. After the launch, the waitlist process will be streamlined with faster approval times. We'll send out announcements on our website and social media.
Should I wait for the launch or join the: Should I wait for the launch or join the beta waitlist?

If you want early access to SentryGuard, we recommend joining the beta waitlist now. Beta users will get a head start and help shape the product through their feedback. If you prefer, you can wait for the official launch, when approval times will be faster.
You will receive instant alerts when sus: You will receive instant alerts when suspicious activity is detected

You will now receive instant Telegram al: You will now receive instant Telegram alerts when suspicious activity is detected.
What is the purpose of pairing a virtual: What is the purpose of pairing a virtual key with SentryGuard?
Virtual key purpose explanation: The virtual key paired with your vehicle is SentryGuard's secure identifier. It allows your Tesla to verify that telemetry configuration messages genuinely come from SentryGuard. This provides an additional security layer beyond the authentication token generated when you first connect with Tesla. Your vehicle verifies both that you (the owner) have granted permissions to SentryGuard and that it's genuinely SentryGuard using those permissions, not a compromised or stolen access.
Does SentryGuard work without internet c: Does SentryGuard work without internet connection?
Internet connection requirement explanat: No, internet access is required for SentryGuard to function. When a Sentry Mode event occurs, your Tesla needs internet connectivity (via WiFi or cellular) to send the event data to our servers, which then forward the alert to you via Telegram. If your vehicle is in a location without internet access (such as an underground parking garage or a country where Tesla connectivity isn't available), alerts cannot be sent until the vehicle reconnects to the internet.
Why does the app crash when I use browse: Why does the app crash when I use browser translation?
Browser translation issue explanation: Using your browser's automatic translation feature (such as Chrome's "Translate this page" or similar features in other browsers) can cause the application to crash or behave unexpectedly. SentryGuard already supports multiple languages natively. Instead of using browser translation, please use the language selector in the application's navigation bar to switch between English and French. This ensures a stable experience without any technical issues.
meta.home.title: SentryGuard - Protect Your Tesla
meta.home.description: Real-time monitoring and instant Telegram alerts for your Tesla vehicle's Sentry Mode. Battery-efficient, secure, and open-source.
meta.home.ogDescription: Real-time monitoring and instant Telegram alerts for your Tesla vehicle's Sentry Mode.
meta.faq.title: FAQ - SentryGuard
meta.faq.description: Frequently asked questions about SentryGuard. Learn how to protect your Tesla with real-time Sentry Mode monitoring and Telegram alerts.
meta.faq.ogDescription: Frequently asked questions about SentryGuard Tesla monitoring.
